session.speaker: Ravindra Lakkavalli
session.bio:
I'm Ravi Lakkavalli, working as a QE manager at Capgemini.

I have over 16 years of experience in IT industry.

I'm a tech enthusiast and help organizations with test solutions through smart implementation of tools.

Extensive experience in Test Management and delivery, design and implementation of UI/API Test Automation, Continuous Integration, Performance Testing and Service virtualization solutions.

I live in Columbus, Ohio with my wife and two kids. I love reading books and recommend everyone to read The Alchemist and The Art of Happiness. I also enjoy playing chess and Ping pong.
session.title: World Quality Report
session.abstract:
Welcome to the 14th edition of World Quality Report, which is recognized as the industryâ€™s largest research study to provide a comprehensive assessment of the current state of quality engineering practices from around the world and across different industries.

In this report you will see our key findings and recommendations for several key focus areas: Agile quality orchestration, intelligent automation, test environment provisioning, test data provisioning and data quality, sustainable IT, quality engineering for emerging technologies, and value stream management.
